description: Ms. codex. Title from inscription on fol. 1a. Physical description: 29 lines per page. Written in small casual naskh in black ink. Marginal annotations in the same hand as the main text. Thick eam paper, glossy, hardly translucid, with laid and chain lines visible. Inscriptions on the pastedown of the upper cover and on the two first leaves, including ownership statements. Title on tail of text block. Foliation in pencil using Western numerals (omits first fol.). Collation: Paper, fol. 163 ; 1-15¹⁰ 16¹² (+1 end of quire) ; catchword on the verso of each leaf. Origin: According to colophon, copy completed at the end ("salkh") of Ramaḍān 876 [March 1472] (fol. 160b). Incipit: الحمد لله الذى تجلى على بعض عباده المخلصين المخلصين عن شرك الشرك الخفى باسمه الواسع العليم وحلى ظواهرهم وبواطنهم بالتجليات العرفانية القرانية ... باب الامر قدم الشيخ رحمه الله باب الامر والنهى على ساير الابواب اعتناء بشانهما لانهما مدار التكليف Explicit: جعلهما مجازا عنها اولى من جعلهما مجازا عن غيرها والله اعلم الحمد لله اولا واخرا وصلى الله على سيدنا محمد واله وصحبه ظاهرا وباطنا
author: Ibn al-Qāʼānī, Manṣūr ibn Aḥmad, -1373 or 1374
abstract: Commentary on al-Mughnī fī uṣūl al-fiqh by al-Khabbāzī (d. 691/1292).
extent: 163 leaves: paper ; 270 x 180 (190 x 115) mm. bound to 273 x 190 mm.

title.@value: كتاب قاءاني شرح مغني في اصول الفقه
Kitāb Qāʼānī Sharḥ Mughnī fī uṣūl al-fiqh

dlme_title_ara_arab: كتاب قاءاني شرح مغني في اصول الفقه
dlme_title_ara_latn: Kitāb Qāʼānī Sharḥ Mughnī fī uṣūl al-fiqh
provenance: Ownership statement in the name of ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻUthmān ibn Muṣṭafá and of ʻAlī al-ʻĀkif (the latter with stamp) on fol. 1a. Acquired by Robert Garrett from the books of Murād Bey al-Bārūdī (Beirut), 1925.
dlme_provenance_en: Ownership statement in the name of ʻAbd al-Raḥmān ibn ʻUthmān ibn Muṣṭafá and of ʻAlī al-ʻĀkif (the latter with stamp) on fol. 1a. Acquired by Robert Garrett from the books of Murād Bey al-Bārūdī (Beirut), 1925.
creator: Ibn al-Qāʼānī, Manṣūr ibn Aḥmad, -1373 or 1374
ابن القاءاني، منصور بن احمد
dlme_creator_ara_latn: Ibn al-Qāʼānī, Manṣūr ibn Aḥmad, -1373 or 1374
subject: Khabbāzī, ʻUmar ibn Muḥammad, 1231 or 1232-1292—Mughnī fī uṣūl al-fiqh—Commentaries—14th century
binding_note: Brown leather over paper pasteboards for upper and lower covers, fore-edge flap and envelope flap. The lower cover has a central blind-tooled mandorla filled with impressions of a small flower stamp and a large outer border consisting of fillets and running patterns. Apparently originally gold-tooled. Partially covered by repair.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
